answers.answer: My dearest friend recently bariatric surgery, and she has lost 160 lbs.  She has 20 to go.  She says that from going through everything known to mankind to try to lose weight, and from listening to what everyone says in a million support-group meetings for people with weight problems, she has concluded that bariatric surgery is the only possible way to go if you are more than 100 lbs. overweight.  She says in all seriousness that it saved her life.
